title: Popover
description: The Popover component provides a floating UI container that can be triggered by clicking or hovering over elements. It supports smart positioning, click-outside detection, and customizable content.

body.raw:
# Popover Component The `Popover` component provides a flexible and responsive floating container that can be triggered to appear around any element. ## Preview and Code Snippet Preview Code {(() => { return (

Simple popover content.

Feedback
